description.value:
The ghost causes great gouts of flame to erupt without warning.

The ghost picks three 5-foot squares within 30 feet. Creatures that start in or enter one of these squares take @Damage[1d6[fire]] damage per 2 levels the ghost has, subject to a @Check[type:reflex|dc:|basic:true] save.

The flames last for 1 minute and don't set other things alight unless the ghost wishes. If the ghost uses this ability again, it dismisses any existing flames.
